reviews.text: A friend and I had a fantastic stay. Large room, great balcony and view. Hotel is in a great location near the port and walk to the old town. Breakfast was fantastic. Amazing pool areas. Staff all very friendly and helpful especially guest services. Also has a great hairdresser. Can't wait to go back!
reviews.title: Best hotel I've stayed at in Ibiza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here with my boyfriend at the end of May for 5 nights. We had a great time, the location was perfect - close enough to everything but also quiet. The hotel is located by the marina and it is 10 mins walk to both Ibiza town itself and the beach. It's a 10 min drive from the airport.
reviews.title: Exceptional Hotel, a must in Ibiza!

reviews.text: We had a junior suite which was perfect, lots of storage, great to have the bath with hot tub option in the middle of the room and the balcony overlooked the pool and marina.
reviews.title: the best no doubt

reviews.text: Breakfast was fantastic, they had everything you could ever think of and more. We also ate at the poolside cafe for lunch twice and really enjoyed it. The fish was wonderful.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were so helpful and friendly, everyone that we encountered really couldn't do enough to help. I had emailed in advance to request restaurant recommendations and they were a great assistance. We were there for my boyfriends 30th and they very kindly brought him an exceptionally delicious chocolate cake and bottle of cava for him. It really made the trip extra special. Thank you!!
reviews.title: Great for partying!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I used the spa facility for two treatments and both were amongst the best I've experienced. I also had two treatments in the beauty salon - also very good.
reviews.title: Gran by name, grand by nature

reviews.text: I did not stay at this hotel but visited it for lunch and to use the pool/spa recently. Very smart and impressive looking hotel and the pool facilities are fantastic. We came to use the spa one day and i had a full body massage which was fabulous! The facilities in the spa are also great and we were able to use these for no extra cost. The next day we came to sunbathe by the pool and to have lunch. Fantastic food and lovely setting. The loungers are 60 euros a day to rent if you are not a resident which is fine if you are there the whole day but on the first day we arrived at 4pm and wanted to sunbathe and were still told it would be the same price. The pool was completely empty and considering over half the day had gone you would think they would have reflected this in the price. But if you are going for a full day it is well worth it.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: On our visit to Spain , we had picked this hotel. It wa a bit expensive but still a great pick as the hotel is just too fabulous and even better are its rooms. The rooms have a bathtub inside the bedroom which makes it so romantic and a separate standing shower. This hotel has 3 swimming pools which is very exciting as the pool is never crowded with kids. The main pool has sun in pool beds in the water so it's amazing coz while you are sun bathing you are still in the pool.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.text: It really is a nice place, great pools, area's to relax. Relatively new ( I think 4 years). Rooms are not ordinary, spacy, with the bathtub next to the bed! Be careful not to fall over this when you want to go to the toilet ( happened to one of our group, and since there are a lot of sharp edges, had a good cut in the face). Service may be better, you feel that in Ibiza they only work 8 months per year, and since the places are full...
reviews.title: Luxury, but service may be beter

reviews.text: Location is very central, with Clubs, Disco and restaurants in walking distance. Just no access to beach, and Seaview means you see a large ugly building after that you know is the sea.
reviews.title: FABULOUS!!!!!!

reviews.text: Spa was always fully booked, so order in advance.
reviews.title: Best choice in Ibiza if your'e looking for luxury + facilities

reviews.text: By far one of the best Trips I've ever been on. I booked Hotel on line and was to my surprise much better than I anticipated!!! Everything from the service Location and accommodations were excellent. We were guests at the Pacha and didn't realize it was just across the street. Very convenient. It was a memorable trip and I highly recommend this Hotel.
reviews.title: Be aware if you are staying at his hotel

reviews.text: On our first trip to Ibiza my wife and I stayed at the Gran for 5 nights in August with a group of friends and we all had a great time. The hotel is pretty big but we were lucky enough to have our room a few steps away from the elevator.
